title: How to Pick the Right Brake Pads
summary: Organic vs semi-metallic vs ceramic â€” quick breakdown for Middlesex County driving.
content: Organic = soft feel, low cost, more dust. Semi-metallic = great bite, may squeal. Ceramic = clean & quiet, higher price. Pair pads with new rotors when rotors are worn to avoid vibration.

title: Dead Battery? When Jumping Works
summary: Signs a jump will help vs. when you likely need a battery.
content: If it dies again soon after jumping, the alternator or battery may be weak. Check terminals for corrosion and battery age.
